content:
PA Conference call 13 Feb 2019 3pm eastern
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PA/2019-2-13+Conference+call+PA%2C+3-4+PM+EST
HL7v2 and Vocabulary Harmonization proposals to review and vote on
FHIR trackers too (time depending)
@Cooper Thompson will you be there?
@Peter Bomberg we might get to discuss 19725 on Location co-ordinates - I've added notes to the item if you want to preview ahead of the call.
Sorry for the late notice all, 7 August conference call has had to be cancelled, so next one will be on the 14th.

Yes the gotomeeting was being strange this morning, so we're using webex
https://epic.webex.com/webappng/sites/epic/meeting/info/136420505313911710?MTID=m28dde6e1b31b6a0863951fa28d0703d9
No call this week, having a week break

This weeks call will be including a review on the disposition on this item

  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-33976
